title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When I press finish on the JAR packager, it reports the error 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: To save the open files, I have to quit the wizard, save the files, open the wizard again, and then enter all the fields again.
EB: I should be allowed to create a JAR with unsaved editors. If not, there should be a dialog that allows me to save the open files before creating the JAR.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Edit a file without saving it.
2. Open the JAR packager for the corresponding project.
3. Enter all the required fields such as path, destination, name, and description for the JAR packager.
4. Click on the 'Finish' button.
